nodes.text: The Pestoriv system was a Colonies star system. It shared its name with the Pestoriv Conferences, which were held at some point during the reign of Galactic Emperor Palpatine before his death in 4 ABY.
The Pestoriv system was introduced in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square N-12.
